name: Balance of freee account
author: Ippei Sumida

sections.description: freee is Japanese cloud accounting software. This plugin shows your balance of freee on dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings->Balance of freee account to configure the plugin. You need to get APP_ID and APP_SECRET on freee.
  4. Access /wp-admin/
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings->Balance of freee account to configure the plugin. You need to get APP_ID and APP_SECRET on freee.
  4. Access /wp-admin/

How do I create freee\’s account?

You can create an account on freee.
Please visit bellow. https://www.freee.co.jp/

How do I get APP_ID and APP_SECRET?

You can get on freee.
Please visit bellow. https://secure.freee.co.jp/oauth/applications

short_description: Show your freee\'s balance on dashboard.
description: freee is Japanese cloud accounting software. This plugin shows your balance of freee on dashboard.
